If you have chrome, look up the extension "AdBlock". Get's rid of everything. Literally every add. YouTube adds, sidebars, popups, you name it. There are even ADDS for AdBlock!
Firefox + NoScript & AdBlock & FlashBlock = friendly mediafire and many other sites.
Dropbox master race.

Seriously, I have been living with the bliss that is Adblock + NoScript for so long that I have forgotten what an aggravating experience filehosts can be

I'd love to disable adblock for sites I support, but nobody appears to know how to make non-annoying ads anymore...

How dare companies offer services for free and then have the audacity to make a cent of two from your download by serving it with ads!

There is no excuse for serving virus ridden junk, even if you are trying to make a profit. I don't mind looking at the ads that pay for a website, but as soon as it becomes a security risk, ads are out.
